## AccessToken type

Represents read-only access token data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AccessToken = User & {
    ExpiresAt?: string;
    InheritedSystemPrivileges?: SystemPrivilegesDictionary;
    Signature?: string;
};
```

**References:** [User](./open-api-client.user.md)<!-- -->, [SystemPrivilegesDictionary](./open-api-client.systemprivilegesdictionary.md)
